item.description: Certainly milder than the Satmar criticism of a Lubavitcher paper back in the day, which if I recall correctly was delivered in the form of Molotov cocktails. #ירידתהדורות https://t.co/D3HJ4gBxUm

item.description: @deonteleologist Related: Is there a defense-of-CRT book (or anti-anti-CRT book) you might recommend as a gift to my Beloved Conservative Relative, who gets mailings from Judicial Watch warning on their envelopes of CRT at West Point!!!!
item.source:markdown: @deonteleologist Related: Is there a defense-of-CRT book (or anti-anti-CRT book) you might recommend as a gift to my Beloved Conservative Relative, who gets mailings from Judicial Watch warning on their envelopes of CRT at West Point!!!!

item.description:
@pesachology This is also why the struggle is so important: The Beckett Fund will litigate Satmar’s case against NYS to the Supreme Court, because the religious authoritarians who are the core of the Republican Party want all schools to be run by unaccountable clergy and funded with tax $.

@pesachology If SCOTUS is not right sized, Satmar style education, albeit in English, will be the model for most American kids twenty years from now.
item.source:markdown:
@pesachology This is also why the struggle is so important: The Beckett Fund will litigate Satmar’s case against NYS to the Supreme Court, because the religious authoritarians who are the core of the Republican Party want all schools to be run by unaccountable clergy and funded with tax $.
@pesachology If SCOTUS is not right sized, Satmar style education, albeit in English, will be the model for most American kids twenty years from now.

item.description: @JamesFallows Biden’s team has rightfully decided that taking their subtle wins to the media just opens them up to being both sided into a net Republican victory. They’re really trying to mostly stay out of the cable news cycle.
item.source:markdown: @JamesFallows Biden’s team has rightfully decided that taking their subtle wins to the media just opens them up to being both sided into a net Republican victory. They’re really trying to mostly stay out of the cable news cycle.

item.description: @trekonomics Have you read “The Secret to Our Success”? My son read it for a college course, and the little I have read so far has been very mind expanding.
item.source:markdown: @trekonomics Have you read “The Secret to Our Success”? My son read it for a college course, and the little I have read so far has been very mind expanding.

item.description: @onthemainline I wonder whether the ambitious talmudei chachamim are experimenting with nicotine gum….
item.source:markdown: @onthemainline I wonder whether the ambitious talmudei chachamim are experimenting with nicotine gum….

item.description:
@HareianiBlog I think the honest one’s feel inadequate but feel they are doing the best they can by the Mesorah. The dishonest ones don’t think about it.

@HareianiBlog Determining which is which is a job for a novelist (or short story writer).
item.source:markdown:
@HareianiBlog I think the honest one’s feel inadequate but feel they are doing the best they can by the Mesorah. The dishonest ones don’t think about it.
@HareianiBlog Determining which is which is a job for a novelist (or short story writer).

item.description: @HareianiBlog A political alliance between fundamentalist factions always raises theological problems.

item.description:
@MisfitTorah @yaeltime I think it’s a response to the Evangelical myth that Christianity was a bulwark against Naziism and is never an oppressor.

@MisfitTorah @yaeltime See for example this critique of a Bonhoeffer biography, which argues that the Evangelical biographer distorted the anti-Nazi theologian to make him a good Christian by Southern Baptist standards. https://t.co/eDTBHMZeQA
item.source:markdown:
@MisfitTorah @yaeltime I think it’s a response to the Evangelical myth that Christianity was a bulwark against Naziism and is never an oppressor.
@MisfitTorah @yaeltime See for example this critique of a Bonhoeffer biography, which argues that the Evangelical biographer distorted the anti-Nazi theologian to make him a good Christian by Southern Baptist standards. https://t.co/eDTBHMZeQA

item.description: @Delafina777 @remembrancermx @della_morte_ @EladNehorai @QueenMab87 @Nymphomachy @silentpenitent @AnIrishVoid @BathysphereHat @ThatRabbiCohen @RebbeSMZ Also responsible for the Bronfman fortune: As Canadians, they could keep brewing. And why let an international border stand in the way of commerce that could fuel Jewish education efforts half a century later?
